name: Karot Fetus
description:
Keep Karot Fetus alive by feeding it with yummy aliens and protecting its mouth from the invasive not yummies. Run back and forth like a derpier than usual Kermit the Frog in the game that never ends or rewards you for your efforts. Your Karot overlord is unappreciative and when you inevitably fail your mission, you will forever be branded a baby killer.

Ludum Dare: Karot Fetus

If any performance issue occurs, try executable version available to download below.
